      • doPost

        @RequestMapping(value="/upload",
                method=POST)
public java.lang.String doPost(org.springframework.web.servlet.mvc.support.RedirectAttributes redirectAttributes,
                                     javax.servlet.ServletRequest req,
                                     @RequestParam(value="file")
                                     org.springframework.web.multipart.MultipartFile[] files,
                                     @RequestParam(value="value")
                                     java.lang.String[] values)
        Reacts to POST method of the upload form Parses the seleced file(s) to List Reads the set repetition rate, noise rate and maximum size of one package Saves all the aquired data to the database Redirects to view-assign or returns view-error otherwise
        Parameters:
        redirectAttributes -
        req -
        files - list of uploaded files
        values - list of set string values
        Returns:
